setOnAtrAvailableListener(BluetoothReader.OnAtrAvailableListener) - Method in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
Registers a callback to be invoked when the card is powered on and the ATR string is available.

startBonding() - Method in class com.acs.bluetooth.Acr3901us1Reader
Starts the bonding process with the reader.
STATE_CONNECTED - Static variable in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
The reader is in connected state.
STATE_CONNECTING - Static variable in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
The reader is in connecting state.
STATE_DISCONNECTED - Static variable in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
The reader is in disconnected state.
STATE_DISCONNECTING - Static variable in class com.acs.bluetooth.BluetoothReader
The reader is in disconnecting state.
